title.rendered: Mirka India celebrates 14th Anniversary by spreading smiles

content.rendered: In celebration of Mirka India’s 14th anniversary, the team visited one of Smile Foundation’s education centres in Delhi. Mirka team participated in a BALA art activity, turning the centre’s walls into vibrant canvases of hope and learning. The children joined hands with the tea, painting, singing, dancing together, as the walls slowly came to life. We thank the team for adding colors, creating a warm and inspiring place to learn, and spreading so many smiles.
